Name: Tamed - Chapter 1
About the game: Your a saleman flying through space when you run out of fuel. You have to go to the nearest planet and collect fuel cells, so you can make it to your sales pitch. You don't have weapons, just the GooPoo protein bars. Make your way through multiple levels and tame new creatures. Throw your protein bars creatures, some will eat and let you ride them. Use the creatures ablilities to navigate through each map finding 6 fuel cells and bringing them to your ship to advance to the next level. Remote play will also be available so you can take turns with a friend.
